mapper.select: DECLARE @c_ControlFeatures1 NVARCHAR(200) DECLARE @c_ControlFeatures2 NVARCHAR(200) DECLARE @c_ControlFeatures3 NVARCHAR(200) EXEC [SkyUni_DB_Moni].[dbo].[P_M_MonitorCurve] NULL,NULL,'TM',#{stcd},#{monitorPara},NULL ,NULL ,@c_ControlFeatures1 OUT ,@c_ControlFeatures2 OUT ,@c_ControlFeatures3 OUT
